title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
When performing the following steps:

1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon

A dialog will appear.

4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename, but ignore the extension since it is not requested
6) Click Ok

The observed behavior is that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but no file extension is shown. Additionally, the file icon in the Navigator has changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
EB: Expect the SaveAs function to retain the file type and display the file extension in the Navigator view.
SR:
To reproduce:

1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file
3) Click the SaveAs icon next to the Save Icon
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename without the extension
6) Click Ok

Verify that the file is saved in the specified location with the correct file extension displayed in the Navigator view.
